src_original: sarvvabhāvasvabhāvau ca niḥsvabhāvau sadoditau ||5 ||  20 | tattvadaśaka |  sadasadyogahīnāyai tathatāyai namo namaḥ |
ajasraṃ jāyate tattvaṃ yasmāt tat padavedinām ||6 ||  jñānajñeyavihīnaṃ [tu]jagadevādvayaṃ matam |
etat tattvāvarodhena yena tena yathā tathā |  vivṛtākṣo bhramed yogī keśarīva samantataḥ ||8 ||
bodhirasau bhaved bhāvaḥ saṅgaṃ tyaktā svabhāvataḥ |
kiṃ tattvaṃ vastuno rūpaṃ rūpaṃ cārūpakaṃ yataḥ |  arūpaṃ ca bhaved rūpaṃ phalahetusvabhāvataḥ ||4 ||
